name: Keir Starmer
bio: Sir Keir Starmer is the Leader of the Labour Party and Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

name: Kemi Badenoch
bio: Kemi Badenoch is the Leader of the Conservative Party and Leader of the Opposition.

name: Angela Rayner
bio: Angela Rayner serves as Deputy Prime Minister and First Secretary of State.

name: Rachel Reeves
bio: Rachel Reeves is the Chancellor of the Exchequer in the UK Government.

name: Oliver Dowden
bio: Oliver Dowden is a senior Conservative politician serving in the Shadow Cabinet.

name: Lindsay Hoyle
position: Speaker of the House of Commons
bio: Sir Lindsay Hoyle is the Speaker of the House of Commons, responsible for chairing debates.

name: Ed Davey
bio: Sir Ed Davey is the Leader of the Liberal Democrats.
